body:
Im sorry to say that I am now leaving Avicus. This is for real, I'm not coming back. Im too fed up with the staff which has caused me and Nemo to leave. Thanks for all the gr8 times guys. I'll really miss you. I couldn't even make a goodbye post for Nemo without it being locked by a staff member. 

Here re are a few people I want to thank:

Galrandir: A great youtuber and a lovely person to chat to.

Nemo1197 (KN10): A really funny person talk to.

XtraMajestical: A troll but a great one.

Tynvale: Always helped with my problems.

My team: You guys were amazing to talk to, thank you so much.

replies.body: Crowman, the reason why I locked the post is because you said that it "wasn't worth" nemo's time. If he really doesn't care, then why would you even bother making a leaving post for him? If he really wanted people to know, he would do it himself.
